## HTMLView.appendTo() method

Appends the view's DOM nodes to the referenced node.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
appendTo(node: Node): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  node | <code>Node</code> | The parent node to append the view's DOM nodes to. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
